primary.context: Caller wants to pay their annual maintenance fees
primary.detail: Agent verified the caller and confirmed the payment link was sent via email and text.

steps: Caller requested to pay maintenance fees.
Agent performed account lookup by phone number.
Agent verified caller identity after a name spelling correction.
Agent confirmed contact information on file.
Agent confirmed the payment link was sent and ended the call.

clarifications.note: Agent asked for spelling after name mismatch.

corrections.note: User spelled a different name than first provided.

actions.detail: Lookup by caller ID phone number
Verified name and state of residence
Sent link to verified email and phone

insights.summary: The caller successfully requested and received a payment link for maintenance fees after a brief name verification step.
